mapper.select: /* getProject */ SELECT * FROM project WHERE project_id = #{project_id}

/* getProjectByGeo */ SELECT *, ST_Distance( ST_GeographyFromText('SRID=4326;POINT('||longitude||' '||latitude||')'), ST_GeographyFromText(#{location}) ) AS distance FROM project WHERE use_yn = 'Y' ORDER BY distance LIMIT 1
mapper.delete: /* deleteProject */ DELETE FROM project WHERE project_id = #{project_id} AND default_yn != 'Y'
